name: Vanilla Tweaks
author: Zsar
description:
? Derinkuyu Station UI name shortened to in-game name
? de-nerfed Lion's Guard ships
	? -.2 flux per damage compared to base hull
	? -cost of Solar Shielding OP compared to base hull
? multi-barreled non-PD guns now shoot all barrels simultaneously
? Remnants of Task Force Safeguard behave like all other unique ships
? stars may now receive up to four Stable Locations, with a cooldown of one year per addition
? weapon AIHint adjustments:
  +USE_LESS_VS_SHIELDS if CONSERVE_FOR_ANTI_ARMOR is already present
  -CONSERVE_ALL if more specific restrictions are already in place
? wing roles are aligned to match their role description
